name: More Object Info
description: Adds more object properties to the object info selection text in the level editor.

show-object-id.name: Show Object ID
show-object-id.description: Show the object's ID in the object info selection text.

show-object-position.name: Show Object Position
show-object-position.description: Show the object's position in the object info selection text.

show-object-rotation.name: Show Object Rotation
show-object-rotation.description: Show the object's rotation in the object info selection text.

show-object-scale.name: Show Object Scale
show-object-scale.description: Show the object's scale in the object info selection text.
